Dialog: I donâ€™t understand why no one wants to invest in such a great opportunity. It would improve the environment that we live in. It might be a little expensive now, but  the long term benefit is worth so much more.

Asking you to pitch your blueprint, wasn't my best idea. I'm sorry, but I have a solution that can help implement the blueprint. First, we have to let people know why we want to change by creating an awareness campaign.
Would you like to join me to raise awareness for the potential benefits of circular waste economy?
